fixes.name: Bull Flattener Normal Shock
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR days = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days]
RETURN
IF(
    days < 750,
    -1,
    IF(
        days > 10950,
        -5,
        -1 * (1 - (days - 750) / (10950 - 750)) + -5 * ((days - 750) / (10950 - 750))
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau nested IF to DAX using VAR for the row-level expression. All column references were transformed to the table-qualified form 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days]. The logic preserves the two boundary checks and the linear interpolation in the ELSE branch.
